protocol.name: P-AFFY-2
protocol.text: Labeling of samples was carried out according to the manufacturerâ€™s standard protocol

text: Total RNA was extracted and purified with an RNeasy Mini Kit (Qiagen, Hilden, Germany). RNA was quantified by spectrophotometry (Nanodrop ND-1000, Peqlab, Erlangen, Germany). Double-stranded cDNA was synthesized from 1 ug total RNA by using the one-cycle cDNA synthesis kit (GeneChip One-Cycle Target Labeling and Control Reagents, Affymetrix, High Wycombe, U.K.)

Seeds were sterilized and germinated on sterile solid Murashige and Skoog medium in petri dishes. The dishes were placed at 4 C for 3 d, then moved to a Percival incubator and grown at 23 C in a 16-h-light/8-h-dark cycle. Seedlings used in experiments were 10 d old and harvested at 3 PM.
(Parameters: time unit = seconds, min temperature = 23, temperature unit = C, media = MS Media)

Seeds were sterilized and germinated on sterile solid Murashige and Skoog medium in petri dishes. The dishes were placed at 4 C for 3 d, then moved to a Percival incubator and grown at 23 C in a 16-h-light/8-h-dark cycle. Seedlings used in experiments were 21 d old and harvested at 3 PM.
(Parameters: time unit = seconds, min temperature = 23, temperature unit = C)
